Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Leclaire
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Lovejoy, Foster, Cicero and Lawrence: due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Racine
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
